description: Little Gem Magnolia is one of the most popular garden plants. This slow-growing, evergreen tree has an upright pyramidal shape with dense, glossy foliage. Its easily maintained reaching up to 10-15 feet in height, and is perfect for tight spaces. The deep green, magnolia-like leaves have a rusty underside which adds to its charm. In fall and winter, pale yellow flowers grace its branches. Its tolerance for heat and humidity make it an ideal choice for any garden, and as an added bonus it's virtually pest and disease-free. Its unmistakable beauty makes it a great addition to any landscape.
